definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
Ediacaran (c. 635-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era/also written 埃迪卡拉[Ai1 di2 ka3 la1]

sentences.english: Increased pigmentation of the skin is common in Addison's disease.
sentences.chinese: 增加色素沉着的皮肤是常见的艾迪生的疾病。

sentences.english: Each Easter Eddie eats eighty Easter eggs.
sentences.chinese: 每个复活节艾迪都吃八十个复活蛋。

sentences.english: Most of the money that Addie received was automatically used to pay off the previous loan;
sentences.chinese: 艾迪所得到的钱大多数被自动地用于还清前面的债务。

sentences.english: He stepped inside and called for Addie, but heard no reply.
sentences.chinese: 他走进了屋里的同时向艾迪呼喊，但听不到一点回应。

sentences.english: That’s Dr. Eddie Bernard, director of the Pacific Marine Environmental laboratory in Seattle.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪伯纳德是西雅图太平洋海洋环境实验室的主任。

sentences.english: Bryson is the former chairman and CEO of Edison International, a California-based energy company.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪生国际主营能源，总部设在加州。

sentences.english: To study significance of AIDI in the chemotherapy of the aged patients with gastrointestinal malignant tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察艾迪在老年人消化道恶性肿瘤化疗中的作用。

sentences.english: Even Aunt Addie's hostility melted temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 甚至艾迪姨妈的敌意也暂时得以冰释。

sentences.english: Aideed's unleashed their campaign to halt aid.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪德的释放他们的运动，以阻止援助。

sentences.english: Addison's is treatable with lifelong steroid replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 终生运用类固醇替补疗法能治疗艾迪生氏征。

sentences.english: In the popular Eddie Murphy movies, they used a llama .
sentences.chinese: 在流行的艾迪墨菲电影，他们使用了骆驼。

sentences.english: They married in 1959, but divorced in 1964.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒与艾迪在1959年完婚，1964年两人分手。

sentences.english: One of the Ady Gil's crew suffered broken ribs in the collision.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪吉尔号的一名船员在碰撞中遭受肋骨撞断。

sentences.english: That day, accompanying Denau Eddie's mother to go home.
sentences.chinese: 那天，艾迪陪着德诺的妈妈回家。

sentences.english: Eddie got a lucky break with his solo show.
sentences.chinese: 艾迪以他的个人表演得到了一炮而红的机会。

sentences.english: See, he doesn't make a sound.
sentences.chinese: 你看艾迪一声儿都不出。

definition: Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
